thread.title: 14 Times Parents Deserve A Medal For Being Patient AF
thread.title_full: 14 Times Parents Deserve A Medal For Being Patient AF

author: Mike Spohr
title: 14 Times Parents Deserve A Medal For Being Patient AF
text:
View this image ›
NBC ID: 10365898 2. When your kid is “brushing their teeth,” aka slowly sliding their toothbrush across one tooth, pausing to stare at themselves in the mirror, and then sliding it across another tooth. View this image ›
NBC ID: 10366013 3. When your kid is “performing for you,” aka demanding you watch them lip sync an entire Kidz Bop album. View this image ›
NBC ID: 10365952 4. When your kid is “getting ready to leave the park,” aka playing out of your line of sight and pretending not to hear you call their name. View this image ›
NBC ID: 10366025 5. When your kid is “helping you clean,” aka making a bigger mess and/or wasting all of your cleaning supplies. View this image ›
NBC ID: 10366036 6. When your kid is trying to “go to sleep,” aka holding you hostage in their room until they drift off. View this image ›
NBC ID: 10366060 7. When your kid is “taking their medicine,” aka tearfully staring at the cup of medicine and yelling, “BUT IT’S GROSS!” View this image ›
NBC ID: 10366075 8. When your kid is “doing their homework,” aka insisting “I don’t get it!” over and over in hopes you will tell them the answer. View this image ›
NBC ID: 10365913 9. When your kid is “eating their dinner,” aka pushing around the healthy stuff while intermittently asking, “Can I have dessert now?” View this image ›
NBC ID: 10366125 10. When your kid is “showing you a cool TV show,” aka making you watch an animated, talking bug and yelling “Keep watching!” every time you look away. View this image ›
NBC ID: 10366181 11. When your kid is “cleaning their room,” aka finding a long-lost toy buried in the filth and then playing with it for 20 minutes. View this image ›
NBC ID: 10366134 12. When your kid is “just looking at the toy store,” aka acting cool until they see something they want and start whining, “Please… PLEASE!” View this image ›
NBC ID: 10366193 13. When your kid is “letting you go to the bathroom,” aka peeking under the door at you until you finish. View this image ›
NBC ID: 10366210 14. When your kid “tells you about their day at school,” aka repeats “It was fine” no matter how many questions you pepper them with. View this image ›
NBC ID: 10366216
